entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
